page.title: 14Bondleigh Religion
page.content: {l943}Bondleigh included in Benefice of Zeal Monachorum, Brushford and Bondleigh. Rectory sold for private occupation. In{1977}altered to the {Benefice of North Tawton/Bondleigh;} service held each Sunday; family service once a month.{Survey of Church and{church room}made this year; decision may be made to dispose of church room to provide funds for church{repairs/maintenance.}Church room (old school) used only twice a year, May and Christmas sales which have changed little over the years in this small C.ofE. community. Entrance fee charged - visitors then have a free sit down tea around a long table covered with white table cloths laden with home bakes. {Plymouth Bretheren.}Gospel Hall - services and sunday school held for which children are collected by car.
